ru.jango.j0widget

Class ListAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • ru.jango.j0widget.ListAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, java.lang.Iterable<T>

    public abstract class ListAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements java.lang.Iterable<T>
    A simple wrapper for BaseAdapter. Acts like an ArrayAdapter, but doesn't need Context or any resources for displaying items.
